channel.title: Release! zentharscape source v1!
channel.description:
This is a pi based(pi=project insanity) my first source everIf u dont like pi then dont download, i have been hosting it for about 3months.have coded it about 6months,owned for the 6months It has all of this: commands: ::home(for a custom spot i made but its not the home) ::resetnpcdrops ::corp ::item id amount(owners) ::shops ::skill ::yell ::server1 ::server2 ::server3 ::setlevel id level there is some more but those r the main ones i used and players use. Donator zone!!!!! Chaotic maul! chaotic longsword! chaotic rapier statius warhammer 100% d claws with 4 hit spec!!!!!!!! slayer helm! 100% real godwars dungeon bosses!!!!! corp beast!!!!! Tons of colorful whips. All spirit shields! If you dont like customs just dont use them in your server :D pk points shop!!!! donator shop! kalphite queen 100%! owner cape death cape tons of other stuff to and most teleports are used in spell book. Custom train.(ps.if u dont like it either delte it or do ::train for rock crabs.) custom skilling place. [b]ALL SkILLS 100% ACCEPT FIRMAKING ITS 99% BECAUSE TO MAKE THE FIRE DISSAPPEAR U HAVE TO LOG OUT AND IN.MOST PI BASED SERVERS DONT HAVE AGILITY OR FIRMAKING.I CODED SOME OF IT IN.AGILITY IS A TELEPORT IN SPELL BOOK.PLEASE ENJOY THE SKILLS :D[/b] There is a lot of stuff but i didnt finish what i started.like i made a lot of stuff to the source but i just couldnt get anything to finish up and get player.i didnt finish the shops i wanted but it was a lot that i did finish.
minigames are, [b][i]Barrows!!!!!Customly made!!!![/i][/b] [b][i]Assault[/i][/b] [b][i]pest control[/i][/b] [b][i]duel arena[/i][/b]
A picture to test for the moment. [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/33v2iyx.png[/img] godsword stances
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/ndljxu.png[/img] d claws 4hit spec!
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2ldevs4.png[/img] home
there is a client and a source in the. source- http://uppit.com/59ijg953v8af/chaosxv1.zip client- http://uppit.com/g8fd4tyn72e1/chaosx_client_v1.zip CLIENT is webclient ready:D
credits to: insanity breakingbenjamin(me)
Enjoy the source not hard to work with.THanks FoR DoWnLoAdInG ThE SoUrCe!
